mapper.insert: INSERT INTO my.users (USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_TELNO, USER_NM, USER_BIRTH, USER_BANK, USER_ACCOUNT_NUMBER, USER_AGENCY, ACCESS_LEVEL, ACCOUNT_BALANCE) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userTelno}, #{userName}, #{userBirth}, #{userBank}, #{accountNumber}, #{userAgency}, #{accessLevel}, #{accountBalance})
